name: Nullify: 2018
description:
Brain Exercising Puzzle Game

The game consists of a row of three tiles moving slowly down the screen.

The objective is to turn all tiles to the value of zero, you perform this by tapping on a single tile at a time.

Every tile that is tapped is decreased in value as well as any adjacent tiles, if a tile has the value of zero when tapped it is reset to it's max value.

If any row reaches the bottom of the screen it is game over.

As you begin to play you will soon find that your ability to remember the combinations will help you zero out rows quicker, resulting in a higher score.

the more combinations you can remember the easer it will be.

eg.
When you tap the left tile, the left tile you just tapped and the centre tile will be decreased in value.

When you tap the centre tile, all the tiles including the tile you tapped will be decreased in value.

When you tap the right tile, the right tile you just tapped and the centre tile will be decreased in value.
